title: By the King a proclamation for restraint of disorderly and vnnecessary resort to the court.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,
notes: "Giuen at the Court at White-Hall, the seuenteenth day of May, in  the first yeere of his Maiesties Reigne of Great Britaine, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
